altername_name: Jimmy Willburne: In Search of the Lost Comb
name: Jimmy Willburne: A La Recherche Du Peigne Perdu
overview: Jimmy Willburne: A La Recherche Du Peigne Perdu (Jimmy Willburne: In Search of the Lost Comb) is a 1994 shareware created by a group of friends passionate about adventure games. In this unusual game, you direct Jimmy Willburne who goes in search of his comb before finding his girlfriend Jessica! This scenario close to our daily life changes us from the repeated rescues of the world and other fights against the forces of evil! A very professional achievement, full of humor and nods to the play library of the time, this game is well worth a visit.
